body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for contacting Melody's Academy of Music. My name is Roger Cook. May I have your name, please?

Hi Roger, sure. My name is Madison Baker.

Thank you, Madison. How can I assist you today?

I was looking into your music classes, and I'm quite surprised by the pricing structure. Could you explain it to me?

Of course, Madison. We offer various plans. Our basic plan starts at five zero dollars per month for weekly group classes. May I ask for your email address so I can send you a detailed breakdown?

Sure, it's madison.baker@email.com.

Great, thank you, Madison. Also, could you provide your contact number in case we need to follow up with you?

Yes, it's four one five, five five five, one two three four.

Thank you for that information. I’ve noted everything down. I will send you an email shortly with all the details. Is there anything else you would like to ask?

No, that's all for now. Thank you for your help, Roger.

You're welcome, Madison. Thank you for reaching out to Melody's Academy of Music. Have a great day!
